metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12519 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Squid through 4.7. When handling the tag esi:when when ESI is enabled, Squid calls ESIExpression::Evaluate. This function uses a fixed stack buffer to hold the expression while it's being evaluated. When processing the expression, it could either evaluate the top of the stack, or add a new member to the stack. When adding a new member, there is no check to ensure that the stack won't overflow.

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.10-1ubuntu2').
